resources.string: There is a new devotion waiting

Standing on the promises of God each and every day is as important to us as the air that we breathe. Showing God that you care too by keeping in touch will draw you closer to Him. Getting to know God more each day allows us to draw closer to Him where He is able to protect and look after us even more!

I bring you Bread by Faith each and every day as I am given my daily guidance by the Holy Spirit and have done so for over a decade now through various means. I continue to share God and all that He does for me with as many people as possible! May our Awesome God bless you today and every day!

Click on any of the buttons below to get further information.
Rate Bread by Faith in Store

Text to speech is now available by selecting Read from the menu or by pressing the Sound icon.

Stay awake, or keep screen on, is selectable through the settings.

A few different bible translations available for verse reading.

Action Bar and icons moved in Latest versions of Android. The notification area has also changed for Jelly Bean onward to give a bit more information. The share icons have changed to include hints as to whether they will share text (txt) or a link (lnk).

The cached data continues to be used in preference to data from the web to enhance the user experience.

John 3:16 will be shown until the app can obtain an up to date feed from bbf.fbcxt.org.

The app checks for a date change in the latest entry on the site, downloading 5 days of devotions when something changes.

If the app does not update within a few seconds, try select refresh from the menu and wait a few more seconds for the New Devotion alarm to show.

A long press on the devotion screen will change from checking for fling gestures to checking for zoom gestures (and visa versa) since the default is to not support both in early versions of Android.
